affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Pure
cmb:
MANA COST: 30/25/20/15
COOLDOWN: 6
desc: Deals minor pure damage and slows the enemy unit's movement speed. Deals half damage to heroes.
lore: The first skill learned by the Sisters of the Veil often signals an incoming hit.
name: phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger

attrib:
BONUS ATTACK SPEED: 130%
MAX ATTACKS: 4
RANGE: 1000 / 1000 / 1000 / 1000
cmb:
MANA COST: 50/50/50/50
COOLDOWN: 14/11/8/5
desc: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.
lore: Mortred's silken veil is the last thing her unfortunate target sees.
name: phantom_assassin_phantom_strike

desc: The Phantom Assassin blurs her body, causing some enemy attacks to miss and allowing her to disappear from the enemy minimap when far from enemy heroes.
lore: Meditation allows a Veiled Sister to carefully anticipate her opponents in combat.
name: phantom_assassin_blur

desc: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.
lore: A divine strike, Mortred honors her opponent by choosing them for death.
name: phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace
